document_data.name: Delras
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Delras''''' was the [[Spelljammer|spelljamming]] ship of the [[lich]] [[Demchungchumrub]].
document_data.Description: The ''Delras'' was a [[great galley]] that had been specially outfitted to travel beyond [[Toril]].
document_data.Crew: The entire crew of the ship were either [[Charm|charmed]] living people or reanimated [[undead]] under Demchungchumrub's complete control.
